text: Marvel's Cloak & Dagger is an American TV series that is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Based on the Marvel Comics superhero characters of the same name, the series was created by Joe Pokaski and was on Freeform from June 7, 2018 to May 30, 2019. Olivia Holt and Aubrey Joseph star as Tandy Bowen / Dagger and Tyrone Johnson / Cloak. The series was produced by Marvel Television. Both Holt and Joseph returned as their characters in the third season of Runaways (2019). == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:2018 American television series debuts Category:2019 American television series endings Category:Superhero television shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Cloak & Dagger (TV series)
